# vertexStride

**Instance Property**

Sets the stride, in bytes, between vertices in all the vertex buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var vertexStride: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

All keyframes share the same vertex stride. This stride needs to be a multiple of the size of the vertex format you provide in the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4AccelerationStructureMotionTriangleGeometryDescriptor/vertexFormat] property.

Similarly, you are responsible for ensuring this stride matches the vertex format data type’s alignment.

Defaults to `0`, which signals the stride matches the size of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4AccelerationStructureMotionTriangleGeometryDescriptor/vertexFormat] data.
